promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple owl electric-type pokemon wearing golden bracers. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or owl. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltfeather, a a massive simple owl electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: Thunderstorm. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "owl", "electric" or "Voltfeather". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, owl-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: With wings ablaze in static energy, this urban creature uses Thunderstorm skill to control city lights. A true master of the nightlife.
